scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build
scripts.update: npm update; bower update; tsd update --save --overwrite
scripts.build: npm run build-rm; npm run build-ts; npm run concat
scripts.concat: cd output/src/ts; cat CanvasRender.js Chord2.js Chord.js FPS.js Metronome.js OSC.js RecordBuffer.js Sandbox.js Signal.js Statictics.js Util.js Wave.js > ../../../lib/duxca.lib.js
scripts.plato: node node_modules/plato/bin/plato --title duxca.lib.js --jshint .jshintrc --recurse --dir report --exclude output/test/ output; npm run report
scripts.stop: killall -- Python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8000; killall -- node node_modules/peer/bin/peerjs --port 9000 --debug; exit 0
